mapper.select: select test_list_id , test_code , test_list_state , test_list_time , appointment_id , patient.patient_id , patient.patient_name , test_list_saved , tests_list.reception_id from tests_list, treatment, patient where tests_list.treatment_id = treatment.treatment_id And tests_list.test_list_req = 1 And date_format(tests_list.test_list_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') And treatment.patient_id = patient.patient_id ORDER BY test_list_time
select EXISTS (select * from tests_list where test_list_id=#{test_list_id} limit 1)

select patient.patient_id ,patient_name ,patient_tel ,patient_birth ,patient_medicine ,patient_disease ,patient_comment ,patient_gender from patient, tests_list, treatment where patient.patient_id = treatment.patient_id and tests_list.treatment_id = treatment.treatment_id and tests_list.test_list_id = #{test_list_id} LIMIT 1
select reception_id from tests_list where test_list_id = #{test_list_id} and test_list_req = 1 limit 1
mapper.update: update tests_list set test_list_saved = 1 where test_list_id = #{test_list_id} and test_list_req = 1
